SPFALOOK.title: SPFALOOK
SPFALOOK.description: $(document).ready(function() {$('input[type="text"].mrEdit').before('Hours: ');});And on average, how many hours a week does he/she spend looking after family members (e.g. children, elderly, ill or disabled family members)? If QUEXMODE = {CAWI} Then ORGINC.Categories={magageall,myspousemanages,wepoolall,wepoolsome,keepsep,cantchoose,dont know,refused,noanswer} Else ORGINC.Categories={magageall,myspousemanages,wepoolall,wepoolsome,keepsep,dontknow,refuse d,noanswer} End If
